  <div style="color: #999999; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-align: left;">Installing and Running Doradus</div>
  <hr />
  <div style="color: #345A8A; font-family: &quot;Museo For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0AQ0HA">Installing and Running Doradus</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E06P0HA">Doradus and Cassandra are both pure Java applications and can run on Windows, Linux, and OS X as console applications. On Windows, both can run as Windows services. Doradus can also be embedded within another application, meaning it runs in the same JVM. Though not documented here, Doradus and Cassandra can be set up to run as daemon services on Linux and OS X.</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E05P0HA">Doradus currently does not have source or binary bundles ready to download. (Coming soon: Maven builds!) The source code is available on Github: see the README file for general information about the project structure. When Doradus is compiled, it assumes a folder structure such as this:</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E04P0HA">/Doradus</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E03P0HA">/bin	- for binary scripts</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E02P0HA">/config	- for doradus.yaml and log4j.properties</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E01P0HA">/lib	- for doradus.jar and other dependent jar files</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0ZP0HA">In this example, the folder </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">/Doradus</span> is the home folder, referred to throughout this document as <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">{doradus_home}</span>. Java 1.7 and Cassandra must be installed independently. In this document, Cassandraâ€™s home folder is referred to as <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">{cassandra_home}</span>.</div>
